title: How it feels to respawn when the enemy is sieging your nexus turrets.
body:
http://pa1.narvii.com/5804/97d3e6564e5b1b4e4ea77950157d24f1382800d4_hq.gif
And then when you need to dive to take out their adc to stop them from winning.
https://i.gyazo.com/6373ffc87a9237e19f4af62bcbb224ef.gif

Edit: fixed gif

replies.body:
As a {{champion:421}}  main so I ult behind and charge the adc from behind [http://i.imgur.com/Stbsfe6.gif](http://i.imgur.com/Stbsfe6.gif)

Edit: I don't know how to fix the gif so have to click the image to see it
My best memory is when I went full AP kog'maw and respawned, the enemy team was bming at our nexus turrents. 1 v 5 I managed to get a penta and end the game.
